common.name: Name
common.everyoneChefTitle: Everyone can be a chef in their own kitchen
common.everyoneChefDescription: Indulge in the flavors of home, support local talent, and become part of a community that values the love and care that goes into every homemade meal.
common.mealQualityDescription: Affordable, high-quality meals that taste like home.
common.chefsOpportunitiesDescription: Opportunities for talented home chefs to showcase their culinary skills and earn a sustainable income.
common.nurturingCommunityDescription: A community that celebrates the diversity of homemade cuisine and fosters connections between foodies and chefs.
common.ResetMessage: Forgot your password? Simply enter your email address or phone number, and we'll send you a one-time passcode (OTP) to help you reset it quickly and securely.
common.verifyCodeMessage: A verification code has been sent to you from roshoon.com. Enter your code below and click Verify Code.
common.PasswordResetDone: Your password has been successfully reset.
